wikipedia_page.main: Matt Davies (born 1966) is a British-American Pulitzer Prize-winning editorial cartoonist, and author and illustrator of children's books.

response: * Matt Davies, Pulitzer Prize-winning political cartoonist.
| Domestic cartoon: ||Matt Davies|||| The Journal News
Matthew Davies or Matt Davies may refer to:
* Matt Davies (cartoonist) (born 1966), British-American cartoonist and children's book author and illustrator
*Matt Davies (rugby league) (born 1998), British rugby league footballer

Authors and illustrators he has worked with include Laura Vaccaro Seeger, Philip and Erin Stead, Mark Shulman, Nick Bruel, Yuyi Morales, Jason Chin, Antoinette Portis, Sandra Jordan, Betsy and Ted Lewin, Wendell Minor, and Matt Davies.

Andrews McMeel Syndication syndicates the editorial cartoonists Don Asmussen, Tony Auth, Stuart Carlson, Lalo Alcaraz, Glenn McCoy, Pat Oliphant, Ted Rall, Rob Rogers (cartoonist), Ben Sargent, Tom Toles, Matt Davies, Matt Bors, Matt Wuerker, Ruben Bolling and Kerry Waghorn.

response: | Matt Davies of Newsday "for cartoons that deliver insightful commentary in a rich and beguiling visual style while offering unconventional takes on the issues of the day."
